page.title: 05A 12 Year Old Girl's Day
page.content: I usually wake at about 6 0'clock, turn over and carry on snoring.At 6.45, my alarm goes and I grope around knocking my watch onto the floor.I eventually find the knob but by that time the alarm has stopped ringing.I try and get my head brace out of my mouth and slowly walk down stairs to do piano practice for half an hour. Most of the time I am half asleep.I play the nice tunes at least twice because then I don't have time to play the horrid ones.Then I go upstairs, get dressed And try vainly to get the knots out of my hair. At breakfast I spill sloe jam all down my school skirt and get it sopping wet trying to get it off.Next I go upstairs to clean my teeth,put my headbrace on and rush downstairs as Mrs.Bayliss arrives. I get into school and put my homework books onto the piles.P.T.O.
